name: ART FROM THE HEART by SamarasKunst

metadata.name: No I Don't
metadata.description:
This is a detail from my watercolour painting "No I don't", very slightly altered.
It is a study using Winona Ryder as motif.
You can see more of my art here    https://www.instagram.com/samaraskunst/
and also buy physical works of art - contact me!
